channel.title: How do u get npcs to stop attacking u?
channel.description:
Title says it all.
how do i get npcs to stop attacking players in game.
Using 317 if it matters. so yeah help if you can. Been asking this question for a while lol.
plz help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 05:21:04 pm[/size][hr]doesn't anyone know?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 06:07:01 pm[/size][hr]C'mon guys! lul
